TEXT.TITLE: <WARDAIR INTERNATIONAL LTD> YEAR NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr 12.84 dlrs vs 3.07 dlrs Net 46,054,000 vs 11,026,000 Revs 491.1 mln vs 473.9 mln NOTE: Current net includes gain of 8.51 dlrs a share on disposal of assets. M.W. Ward holds 62 pct voting interest. Reuter
